author: bridge-bot
content:
<KamilChNethermind> @shekhirin @rkrasiuk 

Do you have any thoughts on PointPrecomiple benchmarks? For some reason it is slow on Reth but only on one specific test case (60MGas) - but is faster for all the others including bigger numbers. This is not a case for any other client - can we somehow trace it together?

author: bridge-bot
content: <parithoshj> ^ This is one of the blockers for 60M on mainnet

author: bridge-bot
content: <chfast> PointEvaluation is "fixed" time and the worst case is the positive evaluation.

author: bridge-bot
content: <chfast> But in generally, 4844 has priced it very aggressively and this will now likely backfire.

author: bridge-bot
content: <chfast> I see the performance being very consistent:

author: bridge-bot
content: <KamilChNethermind> Wasn't a case yesterday tho :D Not sure what happened

author: bridge-bot
content: <KamilChNethermind> Need to check then - is really weird

author: bridge-bot
content: <KamilChNethermind> It was very consistent previously

author: bridge-bot
content: <KamilChNethermind> OK I think I know why it improved - I regenerated warmup files and somehow it helped Reth a lot here...

author: bridge-bot
content: <KamilChNethermind> But really not sure why only one case was slow for Reth and how out of a sudden warming up which did not proved any improvement for Reth before now fixes that
